name: Going Outside Simulator
description:
Going Outside Simulator

Arrow Keys - Move          Spacebar/Z - Jump  

Shift - Sprint                  WASD-Move camera 

F-  Go fullscreen

If you like video games and pretending to go outside, I've got just the thing for you!

Please let me know if you have any feedback or thoughts about the game, I'd love to improve.

Note: If you have a windows computer I highly recommend using the downloadable version available below. It should run much more smoothly.
